Founders

Sanjay and Arvind Seshan are the founders of this site. They are also the primary authors of the lessons and resources. They curate the website, and manage all the content and collaborations. They have won numerous awards in FIRST LEGO League in the last five years, including Champion's, Programming Awards and Robot Game awards at World Festival and International Opens. In addition to their experience in FIRST, they also build and program robots for fun. They are known as the Seshan Brothers. Visit their personal website, Beyond the Instructions, to learn about their work outside FIRST or click on "website" below to visit their team pages.
